entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:32 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
